long_description: Pull on the SmartWool NTS Micro 150 Pattern Beanie to keep your head warm on your fast-paced adventures. Soft, lightweight beanie is perfect as a helmet liner or alone on cool days; fabric features UPF 30 sun protection. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions.
short_description: Pull on the SmartWool NTS Micro 150 Pattern Beanie to keep your head warm on your fast-paced adventures.
